locations: Ealing Studios, Ealing, London, England, UK::(studio) (Green Screen Studio)
imdb.plot outline: My space alien friends, is a semi educational show aimed at preschoolers (and just above) that follow the adventures of Trinity, her younger brother Mitchell and her imaginary friends 'The Space Aliens.' Using a blend of live action and animation and based on Trinity's own imaginary friends, the aim is to capture the tone and narrative of a five year old's imagination, The self contained stories tap into the experiences of children of that age range and some of the issues that they face.
imdb.title: My Space Alien Friends
plot: My space alien friends, is a semi educational show aimed at preschoolers (and just above) that follow the adventures of Trinity, her younger brother Mitchell and her imaginary friends 'The Space Aliens.' Using a blend of live action and animation and based on Trinity's own imaginary friends, the aim is to capture the tone and narrative of a five year old's imagination, The self contained stories tap into the experiences of children of that age range and some of the issues that they face.
